column4: Can anyone tell me how i can findout what the problem is with booting?
can you be more specific?
I just updated my system to 11.10 and now it wont boot
have you backed up all your personal files?
I get past the crypt key page
the raid array contains most my useufll stuff and should be recoverable - but no essentaily I want to get to my data
how did you upgrade? And have you tried a clean install?
I upgraded via the update manager
well, you could always do a clean install.
I want to try to recover data before doint a clean install
well, in your raid, did you create a separate partition for /home ?
the raid array isnt part of the main filesystem
1 have 1 drive for boot/root and 4 drives that are mounted seperatly and non-critical for boot
the boot drive is crypted
oy! Im not sure i can help you there
it claims to successfully decrypt the drive after a successfull key enty
heh strangly just typing 'exit' and I boot
nice :P
yes - something is wrong though
this system has been updated through many versions i think this is the 4th type i've 'upgraded'
